p: Natural preservatives based on EOs have become commercially available, such as ‘DMC Base Natural’. This food preservative (produced by DOMCA S.A., Alhendı’n, Granada, Spain) is composed of 50% EO mixture (rosemary, sage, and citrus) and 50% glycerol [ 52]. Another example of commercialized EOs is ‘Protecta I’ and ‘Protecta II’, consisting of blended herb extracts proposed by Bavaria Corp. Apopka, FL, USA. The contained EOs are dispersed in sodium citrate and sodium chloride solutions [ 53].
